name: SplashDown - Drip or Drown
description:
In splash down, travel from island to island and clear the enemies by oversatuating them (everyone is made of paper after all)!

Pick items and upgrades to help your quest.

All of the upgrades are puns so here are what they really do (can also be found in the skill tree in game)

-Percolation: Additional Projectiles

-Splash Area: AOE Area

-Splash Damage: AOE Damage

-Surface Tension: Cast Speed

-Insolubility: Damage Reduction

-Acidity: Damage Reflected

-Permeability: Health

-Buoyant Force: Knockback

-Buoyancy: Knockback Reduction

-Exudation: Lifesteal

-Absorption: Potion Amount

-Friction: Potion Multiplier

-Torrent Damage: Projectile Damage

-Torrent Speed: Projectile Speed

-Dehydration Rate: Regeneration

-Viscosity Resistance: Speed

-Liquefiability: Spell Cost Reduction
